aboutUs.heroSubtitle: We are a team of educators, technologists, and dreamers dedicated to reshaping the future of learning. We believe that every student deserves a personalized education tailored to their unique needs and potential.
aboutUs.missionText: To democratize access to high-quality, personalized education by leveraging the power of AI to support teachers and empower students.
aboutUs.visionText: A world where every learner has a dedicated AI companion that guides their growth, not just academically, but holisticallyfostering critical thinking, empathy, and resilience.

story.paragraph1: PerLeap was born from a simple observation: while technology has transformed nearly every aspect of our lives, the fundamental model of the classroom has remained largely unchanged for a century.
story.paragraph2: Our founders, a mix of former teachers and AI researchers, saw that educators were overwhelmed with administrative tasks and struggling to provide individual attention to every student in a crowded classroom.
story.paragraph3: We asked ourselves: 'What if we could give every student a personal tutor and every teacher a superpower assistant?'
story.paragraph4: Today, PerLeap is used by forward-thinking schools around the world to create engaging, effective, and human-centric learning environments.

studentCentric.title: Student-Centric
studentCentric.description: Every decision we make starts with the question: 'How does this help the learner?'

empathy.title: Empathy First
empathy.description: We believe that emotional intelligence is just as important as academic intelligence.

innovation.title: Bold Innovation
innovation.description: We are not afraid to challenge the status quo to build a better future for education.

excellence.title: Pursuit of Excellence
excellence.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards because our students deserve nothing less.

cta.title: Join Us on Our Journey
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a school leader, a teacher, or a parent, we'd love to show you how PerLeap can make a difference.
